title: Vulcan Fossil Fuel CO₂ Emissions v4.0
description: Annual (2010 - 2021), 1 km resolution estimates of carbon dioxide emissions from fossil fuels and cement production over the contiguous United States, version 4.0

total-co2.title: Total of all sectors CO₂ Emissions
total-co2.description: Estimated total annual CO₂ emissions from fossil fuel combustion (ffCO₂) across all sectors.

air-co2.title: Total Airport CO₂ Emissions
air-co2.description: Estimated total annual ffCO₂ emissions from taxi, take-off, and landing up to 3000 ft.

cmt-co2.title: Total Cement CO₂ Emissions
cmt-co2.description: Estimated total annual ffCO₂ emissions from cement production.

cmv-co2.title: Total Commercial Marine Vessels CO₂ Emissions
cmv-co2.description: Estimated total annual ffCO₂ emissions from commercial marine vessels while maneuvering, hoteling, cruising and traveling within reduced speed zones at ports and shipping lanes. Includes only activity within 12 nautical miles (~22km) from the U.S. shoreline.

com-co2.title: Total Commercial CO₂ Emissions
com-co2.description: Estimated total annual ffCO₂ emissions from Commercial buildings.

elc-co2.title: Total Powerplants CO₂ Emissions
elc-co2.description: Estimated total annual ffCO₂ emissions from power plants.

ind-co2.title: Total Industrial CO₂ Emissions
ind-co2.description: Estimated total annual ffCO₂ emissions from Industrial buildings.

nrd-co2.title: Total Nonroad CO₂ Emissions
nrd-co2.description: Estimated total annual ffCO₂ emissions from off-road engines, equipment and vehicles including waterborne pleasure craft.

onr-co2.title: Total Onroad CO₂ Emissions
onr-co2.description: Estimated total annual ffCO₂ emissions from mobile vehicles on roads.

res-co2.title: Total Residential CO₂ Emissions
res-co2.description: Estimated total annual ffCO₂ emissions from Residential buildings.

rrd-co2.title: Total Railroad CO₂ Emissions
rrd-co2.description: Estimated total annual ffCO₂ emissions coming from railroads.

total-co2.title: Total Fossil Fuel CO₂ Emissions
total-co2.description: Estimated total annual CO₂ emissions from fossil fuel combustion (ffCO₂) across all sectors..

elc-co2.description: Estimated total annual ffCO₂ emissions from power plants.

res-co2.description: Estimated total annual ffCO₂ emissions from Residential buildings.
